title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 2 - Communicable Diseases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 2 - Communicable Diseases

State Regulations

Designation of Cases (§ 2.1 to 2.2)

Investigations and Determinations (§ 2.5 to 2.8)

Reporting of Cases; Records (§ 2.10 to 2.18)

Isolation, Quarantine and Restriction (§ 2.25 to 2.33)

Carriers and Control of Carriers of Disease (§ 2.40 to 2.43)

Other Measures for Public Protection (§ 2.50 to 2.61)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 2

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§206, 225, 2311

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
